anya-e1202n13:9_1: The Queen Suriyavacchasā, the daughter of the kings, Vajjīsā, Ākoṭaka, Vessāmitta, Yamadaggi, Aṅgīrasa, Bhāradvāja, Vāseṭṭha, Kassapa, and Bhagu.
